title: wine_Prospect_772_2011_Bro_Black_Tie_Charlie_Cuvée_Syrah-Petite_Sirah_(California)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 108479.
country: US.
description: A perfect balance between Syrah and Petite Sirah from Calaveras County-based Prospect 772 this new offering hits it out of the park in terms of its dark, near-black color and subdued leather saddle and blueberry aromas. With rounded tannins, this is an intense wine with a distinct sense of personality, concentrated, savory, earthy and ready to age until 2019–2029 or decant awhile before settling into your glass..
designation: Bro Black Tie Charlie Cuvée.
points: 94.
price: 36.0.
province: California.
region_1: California.
region_2: California Other.
taster_name: Virginie Boone.
taster_twitter_handle: @vboone.
title: Prospect 772 2011 Bro Black Tie Charlie Cuvée Syrah-Petite Sirah (California).
variety: Syrah-Petite Sirah.
winery: Prospect 772.
